title: Late Night Boyfriends: Tales of the gay vampire
description: Vampires. Immortal, sensual, powerful, dark and alluring. They are creatures of fantasy and desire. But often the vampire is painted as a soulless, evil demon not capable of loving or being loved. 13 authors explore the gay vampire in a new light, with 13 tales challenging what it means to love or become a vampire. With stories by Ryan Brixton, Matt Camden, Ephram Green, Victor Harrow, Issac Holland, Ethan Kilburn, Perrin Latimer, Ian Richmond, Luc Ruislip, Adam Shepard, Oliver Sloane, Spencer Terrean, and Vian Watford. Step inside a new world, inhabited by sexy vampires and their lovers.
author: Ethan Kilburn
